sources.title: One Shot One Life | Full Movie | Steven Seagal Action | True Justice Series
sources.description:
Kane and his team have removed The Ghost’s support systems and Kane maneuvers to get a shot at the man responsible for the attack on his precinct – but the FBI has taken notice of Kane’s activities and they want him stopped. Kane’s team struggles to get him close enough to take that shot.
2010.  Stars: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind, William 'Big Sleeps' Stewart, Meghan Ory, Warren Christie

metadata.Plot: One Shot of Life is an anti-war short drama film. it is focused on 'Peter' an elderly man in his 80's, who was a military photographer during the WW II. He thinks that the war was, a stupid...
metadata.Actors: William Best, Miranda Colmans, Daisy French, Tom Girvin
